articles.title: vivo Pro Kabaddi League Season 8: Resurgent Jaipur bring down high-flying Patna - Pro Kabaddi
articles.description: Jaipur Pink Panthers beat the Patna Pirates 38-28. Jaipur’s Deepak Hooda was the game’s top scorer with 10 points, while Monu Goyat led Patna with seven.
articles.content:
